The original Street Fighter is a fighting game from Capcom that, while not very good itself, laid the framework for one of the most popular fighting game franchises, as well as the traditional fighting game genre in general.
Platforms:
Arcade, NES, Nintendo Switch, PC, PlayStation 2, PlayStation 4, PlayStation Portable, TurboGrafx-CD, Xbox One
